name: Sheep Deeper
description:
Sheep Deeper - not so easy way to count the sheep before sleep. A game which tests your working memory.

The game requires remembering a sequence of spoken colors and a colors of sheep passing, and identifying when sheep or sound matches the one that appeared N steps earlier.

You can use both keyboard arrows and mouse cursor to choose the options on the screen.

P.S. Based on dual N-back performance task.
